text: Hagia mai tangada inu dagaao dela e hiihai bolo ia e hagamada e inu nia hagadilinga dagaao humalia e logo, gei au ga hagi adu gi di goe tangada lodo huaidu ge manawa gee, e hai baahi gi nia mee i nia madagoaa huogodoo. Nia golomada o maa e mmee agogo, gei ogo di gili o maa le e moholehole, dono hadinga ai.
